name: Typewriter (Honesty)
description:
Explore snippets of the original Dracula novel by Bram Stoker in a new way. Your job is to swiftly type out sections of the novel. Not being fast enough will bring a heavy cost!

Note: Holding down a key will make it uppercase!

Gameplay time: 10 Minutes

The art was inspired by  Mjairomiguel.

Sound effects have been provided by BMacZero.
